settings.content:
SAFETY AIR GUNS, SYPHON GUNS, PNEUMATIC VACUUMS AND ACCESSORIES 
With a rich history dating back to 1942, Guardair Corporation is a leading manufacturer of best-in-class pneumatic tools and gasket cutters. Headquartered in Chicopee, Massachusetts, the company features three distinct brands: Guardair, AirSpade, and Allpax.

Guardair safety air guns feature exceptional performance including protection from chip fly-back, noise suppression, and syphon capabilities. Designed for safe, and effective cleaning, the line includes a wide-range of specialty air guns for a multitude of industrial applications. All meet OSHA Standards for cleaning with compressed air.

Guardair pneumatic vacuums offer significant advantages in performance, dependability, safety, and life-cycle cost over conventional electric-powered vacuums. Operating on compressed air, with no moving parts or electric motors to burn out, these powerful, versatile and low-noise vacuums are ideal for the toughest industrial environments.

AIR EXCAVATION TOOLS 
Displacing traditional digging methods, AirSpade is widely recognized as the tool of choice for safe, non-destructive, and efficient soil excavation. With thousands in use, AirSpade is the premier manufacturer of air-powered, soil excavation tools for arboreal, landscaping, and utility applications around the world.

GASKET CUTTERS AND ACCESSORIES 
Widely used throughout industry, Allpax gasket-cutting tools have a well-earned reputation for high quality and performance. Today, Allpax is the largest global manufacturer of gasket cutters, punches, and related accessories used in the fabrication of custom flange gaskets.
